sentences.english: The hotel charged 150 dollors a day,the meal is not included.
sentences.chinese: 这家旅馆一天收费一百五十美元，不包括膳食。

sentences.english: Description Dietary Supplement Alpha Lipoic Acid is a powerful sulfur containing ingredient.
sentences.chinese: 描述膳食补充剂硫辛酸是一种强大的含硫成分。

sentences.english: To study the effect of dietary monitoring and problems in dietary survey.
sentences.chinese: 了解集体托幼机构膳食监测开展的效果及存在问题。

sentences.english: The preparation technology of dietary fiber using wheat bran as raw material was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要介绍以小麦麸皮为原料制取膳食纤维的方法。

sentences.english: You can upgrade from self-catering accommodation to a hotel.
sentences.chinese: 您可以将自理膳食旅店升级为酒店。

sentences.english: Herbal cuisine is a special dietary cuisine which combines the effect of medicines and de taste of foods.
sentences.chinese: 药膳是一种兼有药物功效和食品美味的特殊膳食。

sentences.english: The soluble dietary fiber is the konjac flour or sodium alginate powder.
sentences.chinese: 可溶性膳食纤维为魔芋精粉或海藻酸钠粉。

sentences.english: Want to cut fat in meals?
sentences.chinese: 想在膳食中降低脂肪的含量？

sentences.english: Dietary fiber also can facilitate intestinal recovery after enterocolitis induced by chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 膳食纤维还有利于化疗引起的肠道炎症恢复。

sentences.english: The energy content of a diet depends upon its macronutrient composition.
sentences.chinese: 膳食的能量含量取决于其常量营养素组成。

sentences.english: Does the in-flight services include the serving of meals and drinks?
sentences.chinese: 机内服务是否包括膳食和饮料？

sentences.english: A locavore is someone who eats foods produced locally.
sentences.chinese: 本土膳食主义者是一些食用本地产食物的人。

sentences.english: Dietary iron exists in two different forms.
sentences.chinese: 铁膳食中存在两种不同的形式。

sentences.english: Dietary Guidelines recommendations traditionally have been intended for healthy Americans ages 2 years and older.
sentences.chinese: 美国膳食指南一般来说，适用人群是2岁及以上。

sentences.english: The invention provides a method for preparing an insoluble tea-leaf dietary fiber.
sentences.chinese: 本发明提供了一种不溶性茶渣膳食纤维的制备方法。

sentences.english: This can be done, tuberculosis, diabetes patients meals.
sentences.chinese: 本方还可做肺结核，糖尿病患者之膳食。

definition: to absorb (nutrients etc)/to assimilate/intake/to take a photograph of (a scene)
